name: 孫卓勳
objective:

2. Introduction of dielectric resonators
3. Theory of cylindrical dielectric waveguides
4. Simple resonate model for analysis
5. Coupling
6. Practical applications

2 weeks  Introduction of dielectric resonators

3 weeks  Coupling

scorePolicy:
